docs.snippet: Kenya's team have sent their track and field manager home from Rio, Olympics bosses said on Sunday, after allegations he requested money to let undercover journalists, posing as athlete representatives, know when drugs testers would come calling....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kenya's team have sent their track and field manager home from Rio, Olympics bosses said on Sunday, after allegations he requested money to let undercover journalists, posing as athlete representatives, know when drugs testers would come calling.

headline.main: Kenya Sends Athletics Manager Home Over Doping Allegations-IOC
headline.print_headline: Kenya Sends Athletics Manager Home Over Doping Allegations-IOC

docs.snippet: Bruised and battered but still wearing a gold medal, the first Russian champion in Rio de Janeiro seemed to mirror his country's standing at the Olympics....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bruised and battered but still wearing a gold medal, the first Russian champion in Rio de Janeiro seemed to mirror his country's standing at the Olympics.

headline.main: A Battered Russia Remains Strong on Olympic Stage in Rio

docs.snippet: Russia was barred from taking part in next month's Rio Paralympics on Sunday, with organizers blasting a "medals over morals mentality" as they announced the blanket ban over state-backed doping that Olympics bosses avoided....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia was barred from taking part in next month's Rio Paralympics on Sunday, with organizers blasting a "medals over morals mentality" as they announced the blanket ban over state-backed doping that Olympics bosses avoided.

headline.main: Russia Banned From Paralympics Over State-Backed Doping
headline.print_headline: Russia Banned From Paralympics Over State-Backed Doping

docs.snippet: Virginia Thrasher held off two former gold medalists to win the women’s 10-meter air rifle, months after winning three N.C.A.A. rifle titles at West Virginia....
docs.lead_paragraph: Virginia Thrasher held off two former gold medalists to win the women’s 10-meter air rifle, months after winning three N.C.A.A. rifle titles at West Virginia.
docs.abstract: Virginia Thrasher captures first Olympic gold medal for United States when she finishes first overall in women's 10-meter air rifle.

headline.main: Sharpshooting American Captures First Gold Medal of the Games
headline.print_headline: Sharpshooting American Captures First Gold Medal of the Games

docs.snippet: The Rio Olympic Committee is looking into replacing China's flags being used at medal ceremonies after Chinese citizens complained about flaws, the committee said....

headline.main: Rio 2016 May Replace Chinese Flags After Furore Over Flaws

docs.snippet: The crowd at Copacabana's Beach Volleyball Arena loudly booed and taunted American volleyball players Lauren Fendrick and Brooke Sweat during an Olympic pool match Sunday, shouting "Zika" each time one of the duo served....
docs.lead_paragraph: The crowd at Copacabana's Beach Volleyball Arena loudly booed and taunted American volleyball players Lauren Fendrick and Brooke Sweat during an Olympic pool match Sunday, shouting "Zika" each time one of the duo served.

headline.main: Beach Volleyball: Crowd Taunts U.S. Players With 'Zika' Jeers

docs.snippet: Hsu Shu-ching claimed a 53kg gold medal for Taiwan at the Rio Games on Sunday, consigned arch-rivals China to a humbling defeat and should soon become a double Olympic champion while winning a lot of prize money in the process....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hsu Shu-ching claimed a 53kg gold medal for Taiwan at the Rio Games on Sunday, consigned arch-rivals China to a humbling defeat and should soon become a double Olympic champion while winning a lot of prize money in the process.

docs.snippet: A nervous Russian female gymnastics team slipped up time and again in qualifying on Sunday in the Rio Olympic Arena and not until they mounted the asymmetric bars did the former powerhouse redeem themselves....
